name: Sakura
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your waiting room. If there is a climax revealed among those cards, this card gets +3000 power until end of turn.

【AUTO】 [(1) Put the top card of your deck into your clock] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 level 1 or lower character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.

name: Sakura: Got You Covered
ability: 【CONT】 If all of your characters are 《Tomoeda》 or 《Magic》, this card gets +1000 power.

【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if "Lunch Break" is in your climax area, search your deck for up to 1 《Tomoeda》 or 《Magic》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

name: Cardcaptor Sakura: GALE
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand or by a "Change" effect, look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.

【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [(1)] When this card attacks, if "Release! GALE!" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, deal 1 damage to your opponent, and this card gets +3000 power until end of turn. (Damage may be canceled)
flavor_text: There must be something controlling this water! I just have to find it.

name: Tomoyo: Enamored Friend
ability: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, all of your 《Tomoeda》 characters get +500 power and +1 soul until end of turn.

【AUTO】 This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. During the turn that this card is placed on the stage from your hand, when damage dealt by this card is canceled, put the top card of your deck into your waiting room, and deal X damage to your opponent. X is equal to that card's level +1. (Climax are regarded as level 0. Damage may be canceled)
flavor_text: Nothing could possibly be more important than filming my adorable Sakura.

name: Sakura: Sudden Showers
ability: 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your climax phase, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +500 power until end of turn.

【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, choose up to 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavor_text: Why do you even have this with you?

name: Sakura: Whipping Up a Storm
ability: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 climax from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 《Tomoeda》 or 《Magic》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavor_text: Let’s see now. According to Chiharu’s recipe, the next step is…

name: Sakura: Dexterous
ability: 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, you may put the top card of your deck into your waiting room. If that card is a 《Tomoeda》 or 《Magic》 character, you may move this card to an open position of your center stage.

name: Sakura: Not Very Effective
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of 《Tomoeda》 or 《Magic》 characters you have ×500.

name: Sakura Kinomoto
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is level 1 or lower, put it into your stock. (Otherwise, return it to its original place. Climax are regarded as level 0)

【AUTO】 Change [(1) Put 2 《Tomoeda》 or 《Magic》 characters from your hand into your waiting room & Return this card to your hand] At the beginning of your climax phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "Cardcaptor Sakura: GALE" or "Cardcaptor Sakura: RECORD" or "Cardcaptor Sakura: REFLECT" or "Cardcaptor Sakura: SIEGE" in your waiting room, and put it on the stage position that this card was on.
flavor_text: I had to use this card to get them walking again.

ability: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if the level of this card’s battle opponent is higher than your opponent’s level, you may 【REVERSE】 that character.

ability: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul.
